title: Tuna Noodle Casserole
directions: Spray casserole dish with cooking spray - set aside
Cook bacon to crispy - set aside to cool
Once bacon is cool- crumble & set aside
Cook noodles to package directions - drain & place back in stock pot
In smaller stock pot combine soup, milk, Swiss cheese, 1/2 of the parmesan cheese, butter & seasonings - bring to a simmer, allowing the cheese to melt completely but do not boil.
While doing that - bring your peas to a boil in another pan - cook about 5-7 minutes
Combine liquid mixture, cooked noodles, tuna, peas & bacon in your large stock pot & stir to combine
Transfer to prepared casserole dish & spread to an even layer
Place Goldfish crackers in a zip top bag & crunch them into crumbs - sprinkle over casserole in an even layer
Bake approx 30 minutes - or until golden brown on top & heated all the way through
ingredients: 1 - 23 ounce cans Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup
4 cups medium egg noodles, cooked and drained
1 tbsp granulated garlic, 2 tsp ground pepper
